Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining adventure where players dig for ores, upgrade equipment, and build structures together. The game features procedural map generation, real-time multiplayer via MQTT, a shop for upgrades, and cloud save functionality. Players can mine different ore tiers, transfer fuel between players, and use explosives for large-scale mining operations.
